Package com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.text

Class Summary
TextRun TextRun defines the text displayed in TextView with its own specified text style.
TextView TextView defines a text display area which displays the text added to it with specified TextStyle.
TextViewAppearance TextViewAppearance defines the appearance of TextView.
TextViewFader TextViewFader simulates the fading effect on texts displayed by TextView.
